/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings that line the street. These buildings, tall and imposing, are constructed of brick and boast large windows that reflect the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, hinting at the daily life that unfolds here. The image is a beautiful blend of architecture, nature, and urban life, encapsulating the essence of Beijing.
